name: gusplease
text: This is the Donald Barthelme of Achewoods.

name: billyamericana
text: A comment left by billyamericana was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kenthegod, Bourbonsamurai, Ebessan, turnabout)

name: delzhand
text: W-weiner marks?  On a monitor?

name: poodlelucy
text: the stutter is well worth a chubbied comment.

name: epicurus
text: I am glad that I cannot picture what the hell you are trying to describe here.

name: jdhenry105
text: The gentleman commentator opines that he has discovered indisputable proof that his father has rubbed his John Thomas against the family computer.

name: tekende
text: I cannot chubby this enough.

name: soticoto
text: Apparently Billy's dad couldn't chubby the screen enough either.

name: tourach3
text: ZING

name: setzkin
text: A comment left by setzkin was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, 7th_shot, king_of_pwns, NDCaesar, Gumfish, aHatOfPig, mugi, Boyd)

name: laserblade
text: One hundred chubbies, and jolly well deserved indeed.

name: weretrout
text: At least a man ain't make no pickles on the screen.

name: mangtastic
text:
That sounds disgusting...

You know pickles refers to turds, right?

name: phoenixultima
text: I DON'T WANT MY IMAGINATION ANYMORE

name: cheeks_jd
text: fits your icon perfectly.

name: gigs
text:
So, what you're saying is that your dad tried to have sex with a website.

Well, no cookies for him, then.

name: sarabria
text:
i actually told my mother that her computer screen had the same scratch marks.


she was not terribly impressed.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Little Nephew is an entrepeneur

name: aperson
text: Ray is poor at computers. Clearly he lost his eBay_Ray login details and had to create a new account to access eBay Platinum Reserve.

name: tttt
text: LOL in my room!

name: sherief
text: He figured ray wouldn't understand it if he had properly written LOLIMR.

name: kensai
text: I've actually started saying this several times daily.

name: tekende
text: Like a kind of mantra?

name: estutius
text: Latff?

name: scott_335
text: Laff at, like how most ebay listing have L@@K in the title. I hate ebay.

name: cousinted
text: Really, LN is only screwing himself over in the long term.

name: shogun
text:
A WOULD READ AGAIN THNX!!

(See you next comprehensive archive review)

name: shogun
text: Apparently there is some kind of filtering, and apparently it doesn't like six plus signs after the A, ruining the entire premise of the comment. Ah well.

name: rowboat
text: Ray goes all Cornelius when dealing with Little Nephew. A broken down Cornelius without wits in his head.

name: tinhand
text: Dennis Quaid is the poor mans Harrison Ford.

name: mattylite
text:
Dennis Quaid : Harrison Ford :: Gary Busey : Nick Nolte
(grizzled Hollywood producer on phone to casting agent, all like "What? Nolte's on vacation? [puff on cig, grimace, eyebrows pull in in determination] Get me Busey!")

name: sdskyle
text: I kinda like Busey better. He's all funny with the crazy antics and Entourage appearances. Have you seen Nolte in Lorenzo's Oil? His fake Italian accent is ten kinds of awful.

name: littlefatdog
text: Lil Neph expresses his immaturity through his inability to resist revealing this self-incriminating information in order to win this insult exchange.

name: meowmix
text: I can't help but love all the strips with LN. Too bad you don't see him as much in the more recent strips.

name: gussiejives
text: Game Box. MySpace. Flickr. YouTube. IP telephony. People don't get chicken pox anymore.

name: skaterpix
text: Littl Nephew is a little punk!

name: dj_douche
text: This is the first appearance on Achewood of the concept of leather goods being baked in an oven. (The second one is in Molly's blog.)

name: genequagmire
text: "would do business again" is a popular catchphrase in my coterie.

name: carlyle
text: What the hell is LN saying in the last panel?

name: ojnabieoot
text:
I don't know, but I am MAD confused as to how he says "L@FF." Keep in mind that he's actually saying this, as in speech.

(Counterargument: He's a talking cat.)

name: aruntakhar
text: god, when did lil nephew become so sassy?

name: greenkoolayd
text: i dont understand why he doesnt just put that lil bastard to bed.  with the back of his paw.... i would be hell of without sack if i would let a kid talk to me like that.  espesh if im responsible for this kids well-being.

name: fineoakstructure
text: espesh.

name: greenkoolayd
text: its probably the lamest slang word i use.
